summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. WHILE DRIVING 25-30 MPH, THE VEHICLE STALLED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED; HOWEVER, THE VEHICLE FAILED TO RESPOND. THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO NORMANDIN CHRYSLER JEEP DODGE (LOCATED AT 900 CAPITOL EXPRESSWAY AUTO MALL, SAN JOSE, CA 95136, TEL: 408-266-9500) WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE ECO-MODE FEATURE, WHICH WAS DEFAULTED ON, CAUSED THE VEHICLE NOT TO BE RESPONSIVE. IF THE ECO-MODE WAS TURNED OFF, THE VEHICLE OPERATED AS INTENDED. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED OF A SOFTWARE UPDATE TO REMEDY THE ISSUE BUT, ON THIS SPECIFIC VEHICLE, THE SOFTWARE WAS INCOMPATIBLE. THE DEALER PROVIDED CASE NUMBER: S-1508000166. THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AND MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 40,000.
